## ./pachctl inspect-job

Return info about a job.

### Synopsis


Return info about a job.

```
./pachctl inspect-job job-id
```

### Options

```
  -b, --block   block until the job has either succeeded or failed
      --raw     disable pretty printing, print raw json
```
